rease 
until 32 weeks of pregnancy and then stay about 
the same, although the type of movement may 
change as you get nearer to your due date. Often, 
if you are busy, you may not notice all of these 
movements. Importantly, you should continue to 
feel your baby move right 
up to the time you go into 
labour. Your baby should 
move during labour too.
If you are unsure 
whether or not your 
baby’s movements are 
reduced, you should 
lie down on your left 
side and focus on your 
baby’s movement
